files.description: Main documentation for cc-sessions framework - collaboration philosophy, code philosophy, context-gathering agent, DAIC execution windows, and workflow protocols
Kickstart protocol 01: Agents-only workflow overview
Kickstart protocol 01: Discussion mode introduction
Kickstart protocol 02: Implementation mode introduction
Kickstart protocol 03: Tasks system overview
Kickstart protocol 04: Task creation workflow
Kickstart protocol 05: Task startup workflow
Kickstart protocol 06: Task completion workflow
Kickstart protocol 07: Context compaction workflow
Kickstart protocol 08: Subagents and delegation
Kickstart protocol 09: Sessions API reference
Kickstart protocol 10: Advanced features and patterns
Kickstart protocol 11: Graduation from kickstart mode
Context compaction protocol - reduces conversation transcript size when approaching token limits
Task creation protocol - defines workflow for creating new task files
Task startup protocol - standard task initialization workflow
Task startup protocol - directory-specific task initialization
Task startup protocol - subtask initialization workflow
Task startup protocol - resume notes for standard repositories
Task startup protocol - resume notes for superrepo/submodule repositories
Task startup protocol - Git submodule management workflow
Task completion protocol - standard task completion workflow
Task completion protocol - directory-specific task completion
Task completion protocol - subtask completion workflow
Task completion protocol - standard repository commit workflow
Task completion protocol - superrepo/submodule commit workflow
Task completion protocol - conventional commit message style
Task completion protocol - detailed commit message style
Task completion protocol - simple commit message style
Task completion protocol - Git staging strategy: add all changes
Task completion protocol - Git staging strategy: ask user before staging
Task completion protocol - Warnings about sensitive file patterns when staging
Knowledge base - Sessions API hooks reference documentation
Knowledge base - Project directory structure reference
Knowledge base - Sessions slash commands reference
Knowledge base - Subagent delegation patterns and best practices
Knowledge base - Tool permissions and security model
Task template - Standard structure for new task files
Task template - Kickstart setup task for onboarding new repositories
Task index template - Standard structure for task index files
NPM package configuration - May have project-specific dependencies
files.reason: Projects may add custom dependencies or scripts for their specific needs

files.description: Sessions framework configuration - Intentionally differs by project needs
files.reason: Project-specific settings: git preferences (auto_push, auto_merge, has_submodules), trigger phrases (discussion_mode), feature flags (auto_ultrathink, icon_style, backlog_windows), bash restrictions (bash_read_patterns)

notes.current_status: As of 2025-11-06: backlog-md-python missing 13 kickstart protocol files and h-kickstart-setup.md task. Piadda-mvp and backlog-md-python using older DAIC Mode System instead of modern DAIC Execution Windows approach.
notes.sync_strategy: Canonical source is /home/heliosuser/sessions/. All 'exact' files must match byte-for-byte via MD5 checksum. 'allow-different' files document intentional divergences and should not be overwritten during sync.
notes.verification: Use MD5 checksums to verify exact matches. All common protocol, knowledge, and task files currently show 100% identity where they exist in all three repos.
